--------------------------------------------------
ID: C16XUTQ_04
From: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>
To: Tanagra MOE <Tanagra.MOE@chalhoub.com>; Samira Batisse <Samira.Batisse@chalhoub.com>; Shahobiddin Mukaramov <Shahobiddin.Mukaramov@chalhoub.com>; Cynthia Abante <Cynthia.Abante@chalhoub.com>; Rasika Shreyess <Rasika.Shreyess@chalhoub.com>
CC: Harout Karakoulian <Harout.Karakoulian@chalhoub.com>; Richard Samuel <Richard.Samuel@chalhoub.com>
BCC: 
Date: 2025-08-22 17:22
Subject: RE: Insurance Claim- 10591000 LLQ MERLOT DECANTER
--------------------------------------------------
Hi Shihab,

 

For the sending, when logistics log the freight, insurance will automatically apply.

 

We have a deductible for accidental damage of USD 500. I doubt the stopper will cost that much.

 

Regardless, in case the replacement costs materially exceed the mentioned amount, please do advise and I will log a claim.

 

Best Regards,

Hagop

 

HAGOP GHAZARIAN

For the sending, when logistics log the freight, insurance will automatically apply.

 

We have a deductible for accidental damage of USD 500. I doubt the stopper will cost that much.

 

Regardless, in case the replacement costs materially exceed the mentioned amount, please do advise and I will log a claim.

 

Best Regards,

Hagop
